sentences.en: Anita Loos was in many respects untypical of the screenwriting trade.
sentences.cn: 在许多方面，安妮塔·卢斯看着都不像是从事剧本创作这一行的。

sentences.en: bought a new, smaller car, trading the old one down for economy.
sentences.cn: 为了节约，卖掉了旧车买了一辆更小的新汽车

sentences.en: children of celebrities who trade on their family names.
sentences.cn: 利用他们家庭名望的名人后代

sentences.en: Currency-conversion costs remain one of the biggest obstacles to cross-border trade.
sentences.cn: 货币兑换成本仍是跨境贸易的最大障碍之一。

sentences.en: He passed the letters to the Department of Trade and Industry.
sentences.cn: 他把信交给了贸工部。

sentences.en: He works in the retail trade (= selling goods in shops/stores) .
sentences.cn: 他做零售工作。

sentences.en: international trade agreements
sentences.cn: 国际贸易协定

sentences.en: It's been a tumultuous day at the international trade negotiations in Brussels.
sentences.cn: 那是布鲁塞尔国际贸易谈判中纷乱的一天。

sentences.en: Jill was starting to get some freelance writing jobs from trade magazines.
sentences.cn: 吉尔开始从一些行业杂志接点自由撰稿的活儿。

sentences.en: People will trade down to own labels which are cheaper.
sentences.cn: 人们会改为购买价格更低的自有品牌。

sentences.en: Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
sentences.cn: 出售非官方纪念品的推销员的生意也很红火。

sentences.en: she &B{traded in} her Ford &B{for} a Land Rover.
sentences.cn: 她把旧福特车折价添钱买了一辆“陆虎”越野车。

sentences.en: Texas has a long history of trade with Mexico.
sentences.cn: 得克萨斯州与墨西哥的贸易往来历史悠久。

sentences.en: The country's trade surplus widened to 16.5 billion dollars.
sentences.cn: 该国的贸易顺差增加到165亿美元。

sentences.en: the government &B{traded off} economic advantages &B{for} political gains.
sentences.cn: 政府以牺牲经济利益来换取政治好处。

sentences.en: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentences.cn: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

sentences.en: The receiver and the quarterback are going to trade positions.
sentences.cn: 接球手与四分卫将会对换位置。

sentences.en: The two countries do little trade with one another.
sentences.cn: 两国之间很少有贸易往来。

sentences.en: The US trade deficit widened to $7.59 billion in November.
sentences.cn: 11月美国的贸易赤字扩大到75.9亿美元。

sentences.en: The value of our house soared, enabling us to trade up to a larger place.
sentences.cn: 我们这房屋的价值上扬，使得我们可以卖掉它购买一个更大的地方

sentences.en: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.en: They issue a fixed number of shares that trade publicly.
sentences.cn: 他们发行一定数量的可公开交易的股票。

sentences.en: This licence would not allow him to trade as a plc.
sentences.cn: 这个许可证并不能让他以公开股份有限公司的名义从事贸易。

sentences.en: unfair trade practices
sentences.cn: 不公平的贸易行为

sentences.en: We traded necklaces.
sentences.cn: 我们交换了项链。

phrases.tran_cn: 加工贸易；委托加工贸易
出售…以换取：卖掉某物以购入低价值或低价格的其它东西
为购买价格更低或更高的类似物而出售
商品交易会；贸易展销会
以（旧货）抵购（新货）：放弃或卖掉（一旧的或用过的物品），将所得款项用作一购入物品的部分账款
权衡；卖掉；交替使用；交替换位
利用：获得精心策划且通常无耻的利益；利用
用某物换某物，用某货换某货
以旧物折价贴换同类新物
以（旧货）换购更高价值的物品：卖掉某物以购入高价值或高价格的其它东西
从事贸易；和…做贸易；与…做生意
世界贸易组织（产生于关贸总协定的乌拉圭谈判， 其目的是为促进多边贸易谈判和协议而成立的。）

trans.tran_cn: 贸易，交易，行业，职业，手艺，营业额
trans.tran_en: the activity of buying, selling, or exchanging goods within a country or between countries

trans.tran_cn: 做生意，从事贸易，营业，交换，互相做，（在证券交易所）交易
trans.tran_en: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business
to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business
